Class ResourceBundleDescription

    public class ResourceBundleDescription
extends org.hamcrest.BaseDescription
    A description which uses a resource bundle to i18n messages.
    Author:
    guilherme silveira

      • append

        protected void append(java.lang.String str)
        Append the String str to the description. The default implementation passes every character to append(char). Override in subclasses to provide an efficient implementation.
        Overrides:
        append in class org.hamcrest.BaseDescription
